scripts.new: script() { echo Creating ./Problems/${1}.elm ; sed "s|Starter|Problems.${1}|g" ./src/Starter.elm > ./Problems/${2}.elm; touch ./Tests/${1}.input; touch ./Tests/${1}.output; }; script
scripts.make: script() { echo Building ./Problems/${1}.elm ; elm-cli make --debug ./Problems/${1}.elm ./Solutions/${1}.js; sed -i '99d' ./Solutions/${1}.js ; }; script
